text: KNHT (102.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to Rio Dell, California. The station is owned by Southern Oregon University, and is an affiliate of Jefferson Public Radio, airing JPR's "Classics & News" service, consisting of news and classical music programming. ==External links== *ijpr.org * * NHT Category:Classical music radio stations in the United States Category:NPR member stations Category:Radio stations established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in California Category:Southern Oregon University
title: KNHT
